description: Checks the number of days before a password is due to expire that the user receives notification

queries.name: q_password_poilcy_password_expire_warning_time
queries.sql: SELECT VALUE FROM M_PASSWORD_POLICY where PROPERTY = 'password_expire_warning_time'

actions.description: The password expiration warning time is currently set to null. This means that users will not be notified when their passwords are due to expire. It is important to notify users of password expiration times to ensure that they change their passwords before they expire. The default value for the password expiration warning time is 14 days.

references: SAP HANA Database Checklists and Recommendations,https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_HANA_ONE/102d9916bf77407ea3942fef93a47da8/61662e3032ad4f8dbdb5063a21a7d706.html#password_expire_warning_time,SAP Note 3230381 - What are the different parameter options available to control password policy in HANA database?,https://me.sap.com/notes/3230381
